one_liner.value: Data-driven investment platform (InFlextion) that solves the Timing Paradox by identifying fund managers at inflection points poised to outperform after underperformance

target_customer.value: Wealth managers, family offices, institutional investors

notes: Investment platform focused on timing of fund selection. Has webapp (webapp.flextion.ai) with login/register. Team: Paul Ehrlichman (CEO/CIO), Bevin Crodian (President/COO), Nayan Madhamshettiwar (CTO), Joseph Mack (CFO), Maria Rosati (CMO), Merle Yoder (Chief Client Officer). Offers recommendations, insights, and white papers. Uses Three.js animated mesh background on homepage. Core thesis: investors persistently buy funds near peak and sell at bottom due to reliance on 'clock' time rather than 'market' time.

one_liner.value: AI-powered investigations platform (Scout) for law enforcement and national security that accelerates digital evidence discovery 7x-500x with intelligent evidence management

industry.value: Law Enforcement Technology / Digital Forensics / GovTech

target_customer.value: Law enforcement agencies, federal justice and homeland security, state and local government, corrections, fire investigations, legal/eDiscovery teams, campus security

notes: Platform called 'Scout' - intelligent Digital Evidence Management System (iDEMS). Handles video, audio, images, documents, metadata from mobile extractions, laptop extractions, external hard drives, CCTV/IP/pole cameras, drones, LiDAR crime scene scans, social media, prison calls. Features: powerful natural-language search, video synopsis, image analytics, auto-transcription in 35+ languages, mugshot & gang database, camera registry & tip portal, file & case sharing. No per-user pricing. Delivers 10x+ ROIs. True Data Sovereignty - runs on customer's own account.

one_liner.value: Alternative investment platform connecting accredited investors to Merchant Cash Advance (MCA) investments with fixed-interest notes returning 10-15%

pricing.value: Fixed-interest notes with returns of 10-15%, backed by diversified MCA portfolio. Multiple investment options with varying terms and interest payment structures.

target_customer.value: Accredited investors seeking alternative, non-stock-market-correlated investments for portfolio diversification

notes: Investment platform for Merchant Cash Advance (MCA) space. Offers Short Term Note I, Mid Term Notes (I, E, D), and Self-Directed MCA options. Bridges gap between investors, MCA funding companies, and merchants. Has investor portal (investor.supervest.com). Provides capital to small business owners who would otherwise be turned away due to internal capital constraints. Notes backed by diversified MCA portfolio with substantial equity surplus.

one_liner.value: Free enterprise-level skills training platform for SaaS sales, customer success, and B2B marketing, combined with affordable health insurance and benefits for companies under 250 employees

industry.value: HR Tech / Corporate Training / Employee Benefits

pricing.value: Free skills training for companies. Revenue comes from partnerships with solution providers who offer enterprise-level health insurance and benefits at SMB-friendly costs.

target_customer.value: Growing companies with less than 250 employees looking for skills training and enterprise-level health insurance and benefits

featured_in.value: As Seen In section on about page (logos visible)

notes: Founded October 2019 by Corey Kossack (discovered training gap while scaling his previous SaaS company from startup to acquisition). Free training in SaaS sales, customer success, B2B marketing, RevOps. Business model: partners with solution providers who leverage buying power and global infrastructure to bring enterprise benefits to SMBs. Revenue from partnerships funds free training. Also offers Aspireship Plus for individual learners. Average client reduces cost of payroll, benefits, and admin work using combined solutions.

one_liner.value: Flexible inventory planning and demand forecasting platform for consumer brands that replaces spreadsheets with AI-powered automation for ordering, allocation, and supply chain management

industry.value: Supply Chain / Inventory Management / CPG Tech

target_customer.value: Fast-growing consumer brands, CPG companies, operations and supply chain teams

notes: Formerly or also known as Tether Data. Platform handles demand planning, inventory management, supply planning, MRP, PO management, product management, promotions. Integrates with 100+ tools including Shopify, Amazon, Walmart, EDI/Retail, Warehouses, ERPs. 2-4 week implementation. Features: demand forecasting (seasonality, new launches, cannibalization, promotions), multi-warehouse visibility, smart transfers, auto PO drafts, three-tier distribution. Team built core data infra at Clari, scaled ops at high-growth startup, product at Microsoft & Cisco. Invested in by Bessemer Venture Partners (investors in Shopify & Pinterest). Night Capital is investment partner.

one_liner.value: Corporate data and AI literacy training platform that teaches workforces to be data literate through certifications, change management programs, and on-demand learning

target_customer.value: Large enterprises, Chief Data Officers, data leaders looking to upskill their workforce in data and AI literacy

notes: Founded by Greg Freeman (CEO). Leadership: Dani Arnold (Director of Customer), Ross Barrow (CTO), Ant Burton (VP of Product and Strategy). Customers include Aston University (Helen Blaikie, CDO), Coventry Building Society (Kate Jones, Head of Data Product), SSE (Ashar Khan, CDO), Bentley Motors (Dr. Andy Moore, CDO). Offers certifications, change management programs, executive strategy sessions, on-demand learning. Also covers AI literacy. Has 'The Data & AI Literacy Bible' resource. Offers free consultation. Webflow-based site. Copyright 2026.

one_liner.value: AI-powered due diligence platform that delivers comprehensive third-party risk research in minutes instead of days, covering 200+ languages across all jurisdictions

pricing.value: Three 12-month plans: Base (from 250 reports/year), Pro (from 650 reports/year), Enterprise (from 3000 reports/year). Special not-for-profit plans available. Discuss pricing for specifics.

target_customer.value: Large corporations, financial services firms, legal firms, risk consultancies, government, insurance, education institutions, non-profit organizations

notes: Key customers/case studies: Dow Jones Risk & Compliance, Pinsent Masons (law firm), Griffin Financial Technology, Hopehead, University of Cambridge, ClientEarth. Metrics: 90% of onboarding process automated, 65% reduction in onboarding times, 58% fewer hours on AML checks, Â£16m billable hours saved. Features: PEP/sanction/watchlist screening, 200+ languages, corporate record coverage, resolution engine for false positive removal, configurable risk frameworks, bulk upload, API access, SSO, MFA. Has Xapien Xchange Community. Offers custom branding on Enterprise plan. Value from day one - fast deployment. Partners ecosystem.

one_liner.value: Hospitality staffing app that fills shifts in minutes by connecting venues directly with skilled hospitality professionals for temp, permanent work, and training

industry.value: Hospitality Staffing / HR Tech / Gig Economy

target_customer.value: Hospitality venues (from small independents to large groups), hospitality workers seeking flexible or permanent employment

notes: Founded 2017 in Melbourne, Australia by Jordan Murray (CEO & Co-Founder) and Kate. Started as side project to solve hospitality staffing problems. Platform covers temp work, permanent work, training, and reputation/compliance. Used by ST. ALi and Bluestone Lane (US). Also operates in United States. Handles compliance, admin, and electronic payments. Helps reduce tendency to pay 'cash from the til'. Workers can earn more on their terms. Blog covers hospitality award rates. Has both worker app and venue management features.
